mapper.select: SELECT USERIDX, USERID, USERNAME, USEREMAIL, USERPHONE, JOINDATE FROM EUSER ORDER BY USERIDX ASC
SELECT MENU_SEQ, MENU_CTGR, POSTCATEGORY, MENU_NAME FROM BOARDMENUS ORDER BY MENU_SEQ
SELECT MENU_SEQ, MENU_CTGR, POSTCATEGORY, MENU_NAME FROM BOARDMENUS WHERE MENU_SEQ = #{menu_seq} ORDER BY MENU_SEQ
SELECT MENU_SEQ, MENU_CTGR, POSTCATEGORY, MENU_NAME FROM BOARDMENUS WHERE MENU_CTGR = 1 ORDER BY MENU_SEQ
SELECT MENU_SEQ, MENU_CTGR, POSTCATEGORY, MENU_NAME FROM BOARDMENUS WHERE MENU_CTGR = 2 ORDER BY MENU_SEQ
SELECT MENU_SEQ, MENU_CTGR, POSTCATEGORY, MENU_NAME FROM BOARDMENUS WHERE MENU_CTGR = 3 ORDER BY MENU_SEQ

SELECT SM.SUBSCRIBEKEY , U.USERID , U.USERNAME , U.JOINDATE , SM.SUBDATE , SM.EXDATE, SM.PAYMENT, CONCAT(SUBSTR(CARDNUM,1,4),'-') || CONCAT(SUBSTR(CARDNUM,5,4),'-') || CONCAT(SUBSTR(CARDNUM,9,4),'') AS CARDNUM FROM SUBSCRIBEMANAGE SM, EUSER U WHERE U.USERID = SM.USERID ORDER BY SUBSCRIBEKEY ASC

SELECT SM.SUBSCRIBEKEY , SM.USERID , U.USERNAME , U.JOINDATE , CONCAT(SUBSTR(CARDNUM,1,4),'-') || CONCAT(SUBSTR(CARDNUM,5,4),'-') || CONCAT(SUBSTR(CARDNUM,9,4),'') AS CARDNUM , SM.SUBDATE , SM.EXDATE ,SM.PAYMENT FROM SUBSCRIBEMANAGE SM INNER JOIN EUSER U ON SM.USERID = U.USERID WHERE SM.USERID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO SUBSCRIBEMANAGE using dual ON (USERID = #{userId}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CARDNUM = #{cardNum}, SUBDATE = sysdate, EXDATE= sysdate+30 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(SUBSCRIBEKEY, USERID, PAYMENT, CARDNUM, CARDPW, SUBDATE, EXDATE) VALUES (BOOK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{payMent}, #{cardNum}, #{cardPw}, sysdate, (sysdate + 30))
mapper.select: SELECT REQ_KEY, POSTCATEGORY, REQ_BOOK, REQ_DATE, USERID, REQ_CONT, REQ_PROCESS FROM REQUEST
